attribute-processor.name: authentication

documentation.reference: Thymeleaf Spring Security 3 integration module readme

attribute-processor.documentation: Outputs a property of the authentication object, similar to the Spring Security <sec:authentication/> JSP tag.

attribute-processor.name: authorize

documentation.reference: Thymeleaf Spring Security 3 integration module readme

attribute-processor.documentation: Renders the element children (*tag content*) if the authenticated user is authorized to see it according to the specified Spring Security expression.

attribute-processor.name: authorize-acl

documentation.reference: Thymeleaf Spring Security 3 integration module readme

attribute-processor.documentation: Takes the form sec:authorize-acl="object :: permissions", renders the element children (*tag content*) if the authenticated user has the specified permissions on the specified domain object, according to Spring Source's Access Control List system.

attribute-processor.name: authorize-expr

documentation.reference: Thymeleaf Spring Security 3 integration module readme

attribute-processor.documentation: An alias for sec:authorize, renders the element children (*tag content*) if the authenticated user is authorized to see it according to the specified Spring Security expression.

attribute-processor.name: authorize-url

documentation.reference: Thymeleaf Spring Security 3 integration module readme

attribute-processor.documentation: Renders the element children (*tag content*) if the authenticated user is authorized to see the specified URL.
